de.upb.gpa.findbugs.SE_BAD_FIELD.shortMessage: Bad practice - Non-transient non-serializable instance field in serializable class
de.upb.gpa.findbugs.SE_BAD_FIELD.longMessage: This Serializable class defines a non-primitive instance field which is neither transient,Serializable, or java.lang.Object, and does not appear to implementthe Externalizable interface or thereadObject() and writeObject() methods. Objects of this class will not be deserialized correctly if a non-Serializableobject is stored in this field.

de.upb.gpa.Checkstyle.6.shortMessage: File contains tab characters (this is the first instance).

de.upb.gpa.findbugs.DM_STRING_CTOR.shortMessage: Performance - Method invokes inefficient new String(String) constructor
de.upb.gpa.findbugs.DM_STRING_CTOR.longMessage: Using the java.lang.String(String) constructor wastes memory because the object so constructed will be functionally indistinguishable from the String passed as a parameter.  Just use the argument String directly.
